content: We're getting feedback during our eval here from our more UX/designer peeps who keep getting confused about the chevron. They keep expecting it to twirl down instead of opening a popout panel
I opened #7115 for this, @Sean Wallitsch. Thanks for the feedback!
To be clear, it's just an open issue, not a PR. :smile:
Haha yeah, I'm just surprised it went from general feedback to issue so fast :)
@Steve Howell Turn the arrow/chevron into a three vertical dots to mean a drop down menu
A > arrow would work also for the sidebars (not really for the right sidebar though)

@Boris Yankov @Joshua Pan Both seem reasonable--feel free to post to #7115, because even though I agree the chevron is confusing, it may be a while till we get a front end person to do this. It should be an easy change, but we want to be thoughtful about fixing all the places in the same way.
Also, I'm not trying to cut off discussion here, I just want it recorded on the ticket. I think I mildly favor the three-dots approach.
